summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6727 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 8, Winship's Addition and in Block 2, G.O. Foss Addition, being a continuous alley between 22nd Avenue Southwest and Delridge Way Southwest from Southwest Thistle Street to Southwest Elmgrove Street, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district; and establishing a local improvement fund.
